content: *22sc- 2sc in the next* repeat 6 times = 36sc in total 144sc in total rnd7 *5sc- 2sc in the next* repeat 6 times = rnd42 11sc- 2sc in the next *23sc- 2sc in the 42sc in total next* repeat 5 times 12sc = 150sc in total rnd8 *6sc- 2sc in the next* repeat 6 times = rnd43 single_crochet all round 48sc in total rnd44/scallop edge *7dc in the third stitch from rnd9 *7sc- 2sc in the next* repeat 6 times = needle single_crochet in the third stitch* repeat all way 54sc in total round slip_stitch into first st rnd10 *8sc- 2sc in the next* repeat 6 times = fasten_off 60sc in total rnd11 *9sc- 2sc in the next* repeat 6 times = 66sc in total rnd12 *10sc- 2sc in the next* repeat 6 times = 72sc in total rnd13 *11sc- 2sc in the next* repeat 6 times = 78sc in total rnd14 *12sc- 2sc in the next* repeat 6 times = 84sc in total rnd15 *13sc- 2sc in the next* repeat 6 times = 90sc in total rnd16 *14sc- 2sc in the next* repeat 6 times = 96sc in total rnd17 *15sc- 2sc in the next* repeat 6 times = 102sc in total rnd18 to rnd33 single_crochet in each stitch rnd34 *16sc- 2sc in the next* repeat 6 times = 108sc in total baby sun hat copyright october 2013 sara louise bygvraa
